ws.rocket.config.reader

Class StreamWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ws.rocket.config.reader.StreamWriter

  • public final class StreamWriter
extends Object
    A helper class to uniformly write out the configuration model and expected values.
    Author:
    Martti Tamm

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StreamWriter(PrintStream out)
      Creates a new instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StreamWriter

        public StreamWriter(PrintStream out)
        Creates a new instance.

        This constructor does not update the stream. To use a standard head, please refer to init(java.io.PrintStream, java.lang.Class).

        Parameters:
        out - The stream where to write.
        See Also:
        init(java.io.PrintStream, java.lang.Class)

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static StreamWriter init(PrintStream out,
                Class<?> configBeanType)
        Initializes a writer and writes out the standard header.

        Note: the header consists of comment-lines describing the configuration file, usually the target bean type. This header might alter from release to release.

        Parameters:
        out - The stream where to write.
        configBeanType - The target configuration bean type; may be null.
        Returns:
        The created writer.

      • comment

        public StreamWriter comment(String comment)
        Writes out the provided comment. The argument does not need to contain comment sign.
        Parameters:
        comment - The text to be shown after the comment symbol.
        Returns:
        This writer.

      • section

        public StreamWriter section(String name)
        Writes out a standard section name line with given section name.
        Parameters:
        name - The section name without square brackets.
        Returns:
        This writer.

      • nameValues

        public StreamWriter nameValues(String[] names)
        Writes out a comment line describing the expected name-value pairs.
        Parameters:
        names - The setting names (may be empty or null).
        Returns:
        This writer.

      • values

        public StreamWriter values(Class<?> valueType)
        Writes out a comment line describing the expected values.
        Parameters:
        valueType - The expected value type (required).
        Returns:
        This writer.

      • line

        public StreamWriter line(String line)
        Writes a line with given text. Using custom line breaks in the provided text is not checked, nor recommended.

        The line break depends on the stream setup that this object uses.

        Parameters:
        line - The text to write on the line. May be null.
        Returns:
        This writer.
